title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Our manager was held hostage at gun point for six hours in a police auction.” [From the May 31, 1985 issue of Sh'ma. Submitted by Claire Lee, Cincinnati, Ohio.]
